IERC20","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"payoutNumerators","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"outcomeId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"redeemPosition","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"resolveMarket","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"from","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256[]","name":"ids","type":"uint256[]"},{"internalType":"uint256[]","name":"values","type":"uint256[]"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"data","type":"bytes"}],"name":"safeBatchTransferFrom","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"from","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"id","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"value","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"data","type":"bytes"}],"name":"safeTransferFrom","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"operator","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"approved","type":"bool"}],"name":"setApprovalForAll","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"interfaceId","type":"bytes4"}],"name":"supportsInterface","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"swapOutcomes","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalCollateral","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"totalVolumeOnContestant","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"uri","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdraw","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"MagRelo","custom:security":"This contract uses OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard for security","details":"Conditional token prediction market using LMSR pricing  This contract enables spectators to bet on contest participants using: - Complete set minting (spectators receive tokens for ALL outcomes) - LMSR-priced outcome swaps (collateral-bounded, no external liquidity needed) - Oracle resolution based on Layer 1 Escrow contest results  Key Features: - Tradeable ERC-1155 outcome tokens - Dynamic LMSR pricing for swaps between outcomes - Collateral-backed (bounded loss, always solvent) - Integrates with existing Escrow contract for outcomes  Example Use Case: User A competes in fantasy golf contest (Layer 1 Escrow) Spectator X doesn't want to compete but wants to bet on User A winning Spectator X deposits collateral \u2192 receives tokens for all contestants Spectator X swaps tokens to concentrate position on User A Oracle resolves contest \u2192 Spectator X redeems winning tokens ","errors":{"ERC1155InsufficientBalance(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates an error related to the current `balance` of a `sender`. Used in transfers.","params":{"balance":"Current balance for the interacting account.","needed":"Minimum amount required to perform a transfer.","sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred.","tokenId":"Identifier number of a token."}}],"ERC1155InvalidApprover(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"approver":"Address initiating an approval operation."}}],"ERC1155InvalidArrayLength(uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates an array length mismatch between ids and values in a safeBatchTransferFrom operation. Used in batch transfers.","params":{"idsLength":"Length of the array of token identifiers","valuesLength":"Length of the array of token amounts"}}],"ERC1155InvalidOperator(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `operator` to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"operator":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner."}}],"ERC1155InvalidReceiver(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.","params":{"receiver":"Address to which tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC1155InvalidSender(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.","params":{"sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC1155MissingApprovalForAll(address,address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `operator`\u2019s approval. Used in transfers.","params":{"operator":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.","owner":"Address of the current owner of a token."}}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` grants or revokes permission to `operator` to transfer their tokens, according to `approved`."},"TransferBatch(address,address,address,uint256[],uint256[])":{"details":"Equivalent to multiple {TransferSingle} events, where `operator`, `from` and `to` are the same for all transfers."},"TransferSingle(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `value` amount of tokens of type `id` are transferred from `from` to `to` by `operator`."},"URI(string,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when the URI for token type `id` changes to `value`, if it is a non-programmatic URI. If an {URI} event was emitted for `id`, the standard https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata-extensions[guarantees] that `value` will equal the value returned by {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOf}."},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length."},"calculateOutcomePrice(uint256)":{"details":"Uses LMSR formula to price tokens dynamically","params":{"outcomeId":"The outcome to calculate price for"},"returns":{"_0":"price Price per token in payment token units (e.g., USDC with 6 decimals)  Formula: price = basePrice + (demand \u00d7 demandSensitivity) / liquidityParameter  - Base price = 1.0 (PRICE_PRECISION) - Price increases with netPosition (demand) - demandSensitivityBps controls how aggressively price rises - Popular contestants = higher price = fewer tokens per dollar - Unpopular contestants = lower price = more tokens per dollar"}},"constructor":{"details":"Reads participants from existing Escrow contract to set outcomes","params":{"_demandSensitivityBps":"Controls swap cost magnitude - higher = more aggressive pricing  Requirements: - _escrow must not be zero address - _oracle must not be zero address - _liquidityParameter must be greater than 0 - _demandSensitivityBps must not exceed 10000 (100%) - Contest escrow must be in IN_PROGRESS state (participants locked)","_escrow":"Address of the Layer 1 contest escrow","_liquidityParameter":"LMSR curve steepness parameter","_oracle":"Address of the oracle that controls the market"}},"depositCompleteSets(uint256)":{"details":"Mints equal amounts of tokens for ALL possible outcomes","params":{"amount":"Amount of collateral to deposit  Complete set means: - If 3 contestants \u2192 receive equal tokens for each of the 3 outcomes - Entry fee split equally among all contestants - Used by sophisticated traders who want to swap positions  Requirements: - Market must be in OPEN state - User must have approved sufficient token allowance  Emits a {Deposited} event"}},"depositOnOutcome(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Takes entry fee, mints outcome tokens at current LMSR price","params":{"amount":"Amount of payment token to deposit  Process: 1. Takes ENTRY_FEE_BPS (e.g., 15%) as fee 2. Calculates current price for chosen outcome using LMSR 3. Mints tokens = (amount - fee) / price 4. Popular contestants cost more (fewer tokens) 5. Unpopular contestants cost less (more tokens)  Entry fee split: - 50% \u2192 accumulated prize pool (sent to Layer 1 Escrow) - 50% \u2192 chosen contestant's volume bonus  Requirements: - Market must be in OPEN state - outcomeId must be valid - User must have approved sufficient token allowance  Emits a {Deposited} event","outcomeId":"The contestant to bet on"}},"distributeFees()":{"details":"Pulls prize pool share from escrow and distributes contestant bonuses  This function: - Pulls accumulated fee share from escrow's final pool - Distributes contestant bonuses based on betting volume - Can only be called once after settlement  Requirements: - Contest must be SETTLED - Fees not already distributed  Emits {PrizeBonusTransferred} and {ContestantBonusesPaid} events"},"getContestantStats(address)":{"params":{"contestant":"Address of the contestant"},"returns":{"bonus":"Amount of volume bonus earned","totalVolume":"Total swap volume directed toward this contestant","volumePercentage":"Percentage of total market volume (basis points)"}},"getImpliedProbability(uint256)":{"details":"Useful for frontends to display current \"odds\"","params":{"outcomeId":"The outcome ID to query"},"returns":{"_0":"Implied probability in basis points (10000 = 100%)"}},"getOutcomeParticipant(uint256)":{"params":{"outcomeId":"The outcome ID to query"},"returns":{"_0":"The address of the participant corresponding to this outcome"}},"getTotalBonusPool()":{"details":"This amount will be transferred to Escrow when market closes","returns":{"_0":"Total prize bonus accumulated from swap fees"}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-isApprovedForAll}."},"isOpen()":{"details":"Market is open when contest escrow is IN_PROGRESS"},"redeemPosition(uint256)":{"details":"Burns outcome tokens, transfers proportional payout based on oracle results","params":{"outcomeId":"The outcome ID to redeem  Payout calculation for winner-take-all: - If outcome won (100% payout): user gets (their tokens / total tokens) \u00d7 total collateral - If outcome lost (0% payout): user gets nothing  This ensures ALL collateral goes to winners, not just 1:1 token value.  Requirements: - Market must be in RESOLVED state - User must have non-zero balance of outcome tokens  Emits a {PositionRedeemed} event"}},"resolveMarket()":{"details":"Reads escrow results and sets winner-take-all payout vector  This function: - Reads payout amounts from Layer 1 contest - Finds the contestant with highest payout (winner) - Sets winner's payout to 100%, all others to 0% (winner-take-all)  Note: Layer 2 uses winner-take-all, even though Layer 1 may use proportional payouts. This creates higher risk/reward for spectators.  Requirements: - Contest escrow must be in SETTLED state - Can only be called once  Emits a {ResultsReported} event"},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeBatchTransferFrom}."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeTransferFrom}."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-setApprovalForAll}."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"swapOutcomes(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"1:1 swaps would allow users to enter cheap then swap to expensive outcomes for free  If you need to reposition: - Option 1: Use depositOnOutcome() to enter your desired position directly - Option 2: Use mergePositions() to exit, then re-enter with depositOnOutcome()  This function exists only for backwards compatibility with tests"},"uri(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the ERC]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\\{id\\}` substring with the actual token type ID."},"withdraw(uint256)":{"details":"Burns equal amounts of ALL outcome tokens, refunds 100% of original deposit","params":{"amount":"Amount of complete sets to withdraw (in collateral units)  Note: Since entry fees are held until market close (not distributed immediately), users can exit positions without losing their entry fee. This allows repositioning without penalty before the market closes.  Refund calculation: - Collateral: amount (the 85% that backed tokens) - Entry fee: (amount \u00d7 ENTRY_FEE_BPS) / (PAYOUT_DENOMINATOR - ENTRY_FEE_BPS) - Total refund: Full original deposit (100%)  Requirements: - Market must be in OPEN state - User must have at least 'amount' of EVERY outcome token  Emits a {PositionsMerged} event"}}},"stateVariables":{"ENTRY_FEE_BPS":{"details":"Split 50/50 between prize pool bonus and contestant bonuses"},"demandSensitivityBps":{"details":"Higher value = prices increase more aggressively with demand"},"liquidityParameter":{"details":"Higher value = flatter curve = more liquidity"},"netPosition":{"details":"Positive = net bought, Negative = net soldAlso represents total supply since we start at 0 and track all mints/burns"}},"title":"PredictionMarket","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"ContestantBonusPaid(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when an individual contestant receives their bonus"},"ContestantBonusesPaid(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when contestant bonuses are auto-distributed"},"Deposited(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a spectator deposits and receives complete outcome set"},"MarketClosed()":{"notice":"Emitted when the market is closed for new deposits"},"OutcomesSwapped(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when outcome tokens are swapped"},"PositionRedeemed(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a spectator redeems outcome tokens for winnings"},"PositionsMerged(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a complete set is merged back to collateral"},"PrizeBonusTransferred(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when prize bonus is transferred to Layer 1 Escrow"},"ResultsReported(uint256[])":{"notice":"Emitted when results are reported and payouts set"},"SwapFeeCollected(uint256,uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when swap fees are collected and allocated"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"ENTRY_FEE_BPS()":{"notice":"Entry fee in basis points taken from all deposits (e.g., 1500 = 15%)"},"PAYOUT_DENOMINATOR()":{"notice":"Denominator for payout calculations (10000 = 100%)"},"PRICE_PRECISION()":{"notice":"Price precision for token pricing (1e6 = 1 USDC with 6 decimals)"},"accumulatedPrizeBonus()":{"notice":"Accumulated prize pool bonus to be transferred to Layer 1 Escrow"},"calculateLMSRCost(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"LMSR cost calculation (deprecated - swaps disabled)"},"calculateOutcomePrice(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculate current price for an outcome token based on demand"},"constructor":{"notice":"Constructor initializes the prediction market"},"contestEscrow()":{"notice":"Reference to Layer 1 contest escrow"},"contestantBonuses(address)":{"notice":"Bonuses earned by each contestant from betting volume"},"demandSensitivityBps()":{"notice":"Demand sensitivity in basis points - controls LMSR price curve steepness"},"depositCompleteSets(uint256)":{"notice":"Deposit and receive complete set of outcome tokens (advanced users)"},"depositOnOutcome(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Deposit on a specific contestant (primary entry point)"},"distributeFees()":{"notice":"Distribute accumulated fees after contest is settled"},"feesDistributed()":{"notice":"Flag to track if fees have been distributed"},"getContestantStats(address)":{"notice":"Get detailed statistics for a contestant"},"getImpliedProbability(uint256)":{"notice":"Get current implied probability for an outcome based on net position"},"getOutcomeParticipant(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the participant address for a given outcome ID"},"getTotalBonusPool()":{"notice":"Get total accumulated prize pool bonus"},"isOpen()":{"notice":"Check if market is open for betting"},"isSettled()":{"notice":"Check if contest has been settled"},"liquidityParameter()":{"notice":"LMSR liquidity parameter - controls price curve steepness"},"netPosition(uint256)":{"notice":"Track net position for each outcome (for LMSR pricing)"},"numOutcomes()":{"notice":"Number of possible outcomes (equals number of contest participants)"},"oracle()":{"notice":"Address of the oracle that controls market state"},"outcomeToParticipant(uint256)":{"notice":"Map outcome IDs to contest participant addresses"},"participantToOutcome(address)":{"notice":"Map contest participant addresses to outcome IDs"},"paymentToken()":{"notice":"The payment token used for collateral deposits and payouts"},"payoutNumerators(uint256)":{"notice":"Payout vector set by oracle after resolution (basis points)"},"redeemPosition(uint256)":{"notice":"Redeem outcome tokens for winnings"},"resolveMarket()":{"notice":"Determine winner from Layer 1 contest results"},"swapOutcomes(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Swap functionality DISABLED to prevent arbitrage"},"totalCollateral()":{"notice":"Total collateral deposited by spectators"},"totalVolumeOnContestant(address)":{"notice":"Total swap volume directed toward each contestant (for transparency)"},"withdraw(uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraw by burning complete set of outcome tokens for full 0x67672e4ca1dafdcc661d4eba8475cfac631fa0933309258e3af7644b92e1fb26","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://30192451f05ea5ddb0c18bd0f9003f098505836ba19c08a9c365adf829454da2","dweb:/ipfs/QmfCuZSCTyCdFoSKn7MSaN6hZksnQn9ZhrZDAdRTCbwGu2"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/StorageSlot.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcf74f855663ce2ae00ed8352666b7935f6cddea2932fdf2c3ecd30a9b1cd0e97","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9f660b1f351b757dfe01438e59888f31f33ded3afcf5cb5b0d9bf9aa6f320a8b","dweb:/ipfs/QmarDJ5hZEgBtCmmrVzEZWjub9769eD686jmzb2XpSU1cM"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/ERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0xddce8e17e3d3f9ed818b4f4c4478a8262aab8b11ed322f1bf5ed705bb4bd97fa","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8084aa71a4cc7d2980972412a88fe4f114869faea3fefa5436431644eb5c0287","dweb:/ipfs/Qmbqfs5dRdPvHVKY8kTaeyc65NdqXRQwRK7h9s5UJEhD1p"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x79796192ec90263f21b464d5bc90b777a525971d3de8232be80d9c4f9fb353b8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f6fda447a62815e8064f47eff0dd1cf58d9207ad69b5d32280f8d7ed1d1e4621","dweb:/ipfs/QmfDRc7pxfaXB2Dh9np5Uf29Na3pQ7tafRS684wd3GLjVL"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1225214420c83ebcca88f2ae2b50f053aaa7df7bd684c3e878d334627f2edfc6","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6c5fab4970634f9ab9a620983dc1c8a30153981a0b1a521666e269d0a11399d3","dweb:/ipfs/QmVRnBC575MESGkEHndjujtR7qub2FzU9RWy9eKLp4hPZB"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/SafeCast.sol":{"keccak256":"0x195533c86d0ef72bcc06456a4f66a9b941f38eb403739b00f21fd7c1abd1ae54","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b1d578337048cad08c1c03041cca5978eff5428aa130c781b271ad9e5566e1f8","dweb:/ipfs/QmPFKL2r9CBsMwmUqqdcFPfHZB2qcs9g1HDrPxzWSxomvy"]},"src/Escrow.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8791ecafc802905e849cbfd8353fed4523f39b11c3319acd5c8e583603e179dc","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4fbea43743b4065f8472754e7bc15d089b0d650a3464e67b3e2c069d8bddc3cd","dweb:/ipfs/QmRTb83G balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

calculateOutcomePrice(uint256).details: Uses LMSR formula to price tokens dynamically

params.outcomeId: The outcome to calculate price for

returns._0: price Price per token in payment token units (e.g., USDC with 6 decimals)  Formula: price = basePrice + (demand × demandSensitivity) / liquidityParameter  - Base price = 1.0 (PRICE_PRECISION) - Price increases with netPosition (demand) - demandSensitivityBps controls how aggressively price rises - Popular contestants = higher price = fewer tokens per dollar - Unpopular contestants = lower price = more tokens per dollar

constructor.details: Reads participants from existing Escrow contract to set outcomes

params._demandSensitivityBps: Controls swap cost magnitude - higher = more aggressive pricing  Requirements: - _escrow must not be zero address - _oracle must not be zero address - _liquidityParameter must be greater than 0 - _demandSensitivityBps must not exceed 10000 (100%) - Contest escrow must be in IN_PROGRESS state (participants locked)
params._escrow: Address of the Layer 1 contest escrow
params._oracle: Address of the oracle that controls the market

depositCompleteSets(uint256).details: Mints equal amounts of tokens for ALL possible outcomes

params.amount: Amount of collateral to deposit  Complete set means: - If 3 contestants → receive equal tokens for each of the 3 outcomes - Entry fee split equally among all contestants - Used by sophisticated traders who want to swap positions  Requirements: - Market must be in OPEN state - User must have approved sufficient token allowance  Emits a {Deposited} event

depositOnOutcome(uint256,uint256).details: Takes entry fee, mints outcome tokens at current LMSR price

params.amount: Amount of payment token to deposit  Process: 1. Takes ENTRY_FEE_BPS (e.g., 15%) as fee 2. Calculates current price for chosen outcome using LMSR 3. Mints tokens = (amount - fee) / price 4. Popular contestants cost more (fewer tokens) 5. Unpopular contestants cost less (more tokens)  Entry fee split: - 50% → accumulated prize pool (sent to Layer 1 Escrow) - 50% → chosen contestant's volume bonus  Requirements: - Market must be in OPEN state - outcomeId must be valid - User must have approved sufficient token allowance  Emits a {Deposited} event

distributeFees().details: Pulls prize pool share from escrow and distributes contestant bonuses  This function: - Pulls accumulated fee share from escrow's final pool - Distributes contestant bonuses based on betting volume - Can only be called once after settlement  Requirements: - Contest must be SETTLED - Fees not already distributed  Emits {PrizeBonusTransferred} and {ContestantBonusesPaid} events

returns.totalVolume: Total swap volume directed toward this contestant
returns.volumePercentage: Percentage of total market volume (basis points)

getImpliedProbability(uint256).details: Useful for frontends to display current "odds"

returns._0: The address of the participant corresponding to this outcome

getTotalBonusPool().details: This amount will be transferred to Escrow when market closes

returns._0: Total prize bonus accumulated from swap fees

isOpen().details: Market is open when contest escrow is IN_PROGRESS

redeemPosition(uint256).details: Burns outcome tokens, transfers proportional payout based on oracle results

params.outcomeId: The outcome ID to redeem  Payout calculation for winner-take-all: - If outcome won (100% payout): user gets (their tokens / total tokens) × total collateral - If outcome lost (0% payout): user gets nothing  This ensures ALL collateral goes to winners, not just 1:1 token value.  Requirements: - Market must be in RESOLVED state - User must have non-zero balance of outcome tokens  Emits a {PositionRedeemed} event

resolveMarket().details: Reads escrow results and sets winner-take-all payout vector  This function: - Reads payout amounts from Layer 1 contest - Finds the contestant with highest payout (winner) - Sets winner's payout to 100%, all others to 0% (winner-take-all)  Note: Layer 2 uses winner-take-all, even though Layer 1 may use proportional payouts. This creates higher risk/reward for spectators.  Requirements: - Contest escrow must be in SETTLED state - Can only be called once  Emits a {ResultsReported} event

swapOutcomes(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: 1:1 swaps would allow users to enter cheap then swap to expensive outcomes for free  If you need to reposition: - Option 1: Use depositOnOutcome() to enter your desired position directly - Option 2: Use mergePositions() to exit, then re-enter with depositOnOutcome()  This function exists only for backwards compatibility with tests

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the ERC]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.

withdraw(uint256).details: Burns equal amounts of ALL outcome tokens, refunds 100% of original deposit

params.amount: Amount of complete sets to withdraw (in collateral units)  Note: Since entry fees are held until market close (not distributed immediately), users can exit positions without losing their entry fee. This allows repositioning without penalty before the market closes.  Refund calculation: - Collateral: amount (the 85% that backed tokens) - Entry fee: (amount × ENTRY_FEE_BPS) / (PAYOUT_DENOMINATOR - ENTRY_FEE_BPS) - Total refund: Full original deposit (100%)  Requirements: - Market must be in OPEN state - User must have at least 'amount' of EVERY outcome token  Emits a {PositionsMerged} event

ENTRY_FEE_BPS().notice: Entry fee in basis points taken from all deposits (e.g., 1500 = 15%)

PRICE_PRECISION().notice: Price precision for token pricing (1e6 = 1 USDC with 6 decimals)

accumulatedPrizeBonus().notice: Accumulated prize pool bonus to be transferred to Layer 1 Escrow

calculateOutcomePrice(uint256).notice: Calculate current price for an outcome token based on demand

contestantBonuses(address).notice: Bonuses earned by each contestant from betting volume

demandSensitivityBps().notice: Demand sensitivity in basis points - controls LMSR price curve steepness

depositCompleteSets(uint256).notice: Deposit and receive complete set of outcome tokens (advanced users)

depositOnOutcome(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit on a specific contestant (primary entry point)

distributeFees().notice: Distribute accumulated fees after contest is settled

feesDistributed().notice: Flag to track if fees have been distributed

getContestantStats(address).notice: Get detailed statistics for a contestant

getImpliedProbability(uint256).notice: Get current implied probability for an outcome based on net position

getOutcomeParticipant(uint256).notice: Get the participant address for a given outcome ID

getTotalBonusPool().notice: Get total accumulated prize pool bonus

isOpen().notice: Check if market is open for betting

isSettled().notice: Check if contest has been settled

liquidityParameter().notice: LMSR liquidity parameter - controls price curve steepness

netPosition(uint256).notice: Track net position for each outcome (for LMSR pricing)

numOutcomes().notice: Number of possible outcomes (equals number of contest participants)

oracle().notice: Address of the oracle that controls market state

outcomeToParticipant(uint256).notice: Map outcome IDs to contest participant addresses

participantToOutcome(address).notice: Map contest participant addresses to outcome IDs

paymentToken().notice: The payment token used for collateral deposits and payouts

payoutNumerators(uint256).notice: Payout vector set by oracle after resolution (basis points)

resolveMarket().notice: Determine winner from Layer 1 contest results

swapOutcomes(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Swap functionality DISABLED to prevent arbitrage

totalVolumeOnContestant(address).notice: Total swap volume directed toward each contestant (for transparency)

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw by burning complete set of outcome tokens for full refund
